item.description: What The most secure voting app in the world. Everything is made on the device: encryption of the vote, collaborative decryption of the tally (using partial decryption from different entities), verification of the vote How Using the Helios protocol and INRIA’s Belenios voting library. Why It is useful — First version A minimal server. A one-time-password will be sent to participants by phone or email, removing the need of user accounts.
